text: Just because you've got the emotional range of a teaspoon doesn't mean we all have.
author: Hermione Granger

text: I don't go looking for trouble. Trouble usually finds me.
author: Harry Potter

text: Ah, music. A magic beyond all we do here!
author: Albus Dumbledore

text: We did it, we bashed them, wee Potter's the one, and Voldy's gone moldy, so now let's have fun!
author: Peeves the Poltergeist

text: Time is making fools of us again.
author: Dumbledore

text: Of course, it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean that it is not real?
author: Albus Dumbledore

text: Just because I told you my name, doesn't mean you can use it.
author: Luna Lovegood

text: Why spiders? Why couldn't it be 'follow the butterflies'?
author: Ron Weasley

text: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
author: Albus Dumbledore

text: There's no need to call me 'sir,' Professor.
author: Harry Potter

text: You're a little scary sometimes, you know that? Brilliant ... but scary.
author: Ron Weasley

text: I hope you're pleased with yourselves. We could all have been killed — or worse, expelled.
author: Hermione Granger

text: I don’t believe I've ever seen our students quite this united in my twenty years at Hogwarts.
author: Minerva McGonagall

text: It's a strange thing, but when you are dreading something, and would give anything to slow down time, it has a disobliging habit of speeding up.
author: J.K. Rowling

text: Just because it's taken you three years to notice, Ron, doesn't mean no one else has spotted I'm a girl!
author: Hermione Granger

text: I solemnly swear that I am up to no good.
author: Fred and George Weasley

text: The mind is not a book, to be opened at will and examined at leisure.
author: Severus Snape

text: We teachers are rather good at magic, you know.
author: Minerva McGonagall

text: Nitwit! Blubber! Oddment! Tweak!
author: Albus Dumbledore

text: You know, Minister, I disagree with Dumbledore on many counts...but you cannot deny he's got style.
author: Phineas Nigellus Black

text: You're just as sane as I am.
author: Luna Lovegood

text: Why spiders? Why couldn't it be 'follow the butterflies'?
author: Ron Weasley

text: If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals.
author: Sirius Black

text: I am not worried, Harry. I am with you.
author: Ginny Weasley

text: I hope you're pleased with yourselves. We could all have been killed — or worse, expelled.
author: Hermione Granger

text: You're a wizard, Harry!
author: Rubeus Hagrid

text: We teachers are rather good at magic, you know.
author: Minerva McGonagall

text: Don't let the muggles get you down.
author: Ron Weasley

text: Mischief Managed.
author: Fred and George Weasley

text: I solemnly swear that I am up to no good.
author: Fred and George Weasley

text: What's life without a little risk?
author: Sirius Black

text: Anything's possible if you've got enough nerve.
author: Ginny Weasley

text: You sort of start thinking anything's possible if you've got enough nerve.
author: Ginny Weasley

text: I'm going to bed before either of you come up with another clever idea to get us killed — or worse, expelled.
author: Hermione Granger

text: Why are they all staring?
author: Harry Potter

text: It unscrews the other way.
author: Hermione Granger

text: The mind is not a book, to be opened at will and examined at leisure.
author: Severus Snape

text: You are a braver man by far than Igor Karkaroff. You know, I sometimes think we sort too soon...
author: Minerva McGonagall

text: Did you like question ten, Moony?
author: Fred Weasley

text: Do I look stupid?
author: Ron Weasley
